Description: Fragment of round handle, nearly complete, of an Apulian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine buff. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Name Kephalon. Known from the Apani site, P. Palazzo, Le anfore di Apani (Brindisi), Rome 2013, 121, type A1.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (333)
